channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: OGE to Hold Welcome for New Graduate Students
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 8, 2025 12:30 PM - 3:00 PM - Graduate students are welcome to attend the Office of Graduate Education’s gathering, which will cover essential campus information, academic policies and procedures, and other relevant topics.
item.author: Students

item.title: Sympa Lists Transitioning to Single Sign-On Starting January 8, 2025
item.description: Starting January 8, 2025, Sympa will transition to using Single Sign-On (SSO) for login. A new “RPI Single Sign-On” button will be added to the top-right corner of the Sympa login page, and community members with RPI email addresses must use this button to log in. Non-RPI email addresses can continue to use the existing email/password login method.
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI, GlobalFoundries Partner on Semiconductor Workforce Development
item.description: Building on several ongoing collaborations, Rensselaer and GlobalFoundries are working together to further grow and strengthen the semiconductor workforce in the region. RPI has launched a partnership program with Global Foundries to provide their employees with opportunities to pursue degrees and enhance their skills in semiconductor technology.
item.author: Community

item.title: HelioCampus Syllabus Available for Spring 25 Term
item.description: The HelioCampus syllabus tool is available for faculty to update or complete for the spring semester. Multiple opportunities for HelioCampus syllabus assistance are available during in-person or virtual office hours with Amy Svirsky, Learning Assessment Specialist.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: A Reminder Regarding Mediasite Classroom Recording for Spring 2025
item.description: Multimedia Services reminds all faculty to submit their requests for course recordings in supported classrooms for the spring 2025 semester. Requests will be processed beginning January 2, 2025 for the start of classes the following week.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Training Webinar to Focus on Reviewing Fall End-of-Term Student Course Evaluations
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - This webinar is for instructors and TAs who would like to better understand — or get a refresher course in — the various ways they can review their student course evaluations in HelioCampus.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
